#summary Configure Applications
#labels ffead,cpp,application,configuration,controller,template,dynamic,view,dview,filter

= application.xml =
{{{
<app>
	<controllers>
		<controller class="ExampleController" url="*.action"/>
		<controller class="ExampleController" url="*.do"/>
		<controller from="*.yourext" to="*.html"/>
	</controllers>
	<authhandlers>
		<authhandler provider="file:users" url="*.authenticate"/>
		<authhandler provider="class:ExampleOAUTHController" url="*.oauth"/>
	</authhandlers>
	<templates>
		<template class="DefTemp" file="test.tpe"/>
	</templates>
	<dviews>
		<dview class="Dview" path="test.view"/>
	</dviews>
	<filters>
		<filter class="ExampleIOFilter" type="in"/>
		<filter class="ExampleIOFilter" type="out"/>
	</filters>
	<restcontrollers>
		<restcontroller class="ExampleRestController" urlpath="/rest/path/" name="rest1">
			<restfunction name="addNumbers" alias="add">
				<param pos="1" type="int"/>
				<param pos="2" type="int"/>
			</restfunction>
		</restcontroller>
		<restcontroller class="ExampleRestController" urlpath="/rest/path1/" name="rest2">
			<restfunction name="addNumbers" alias="+">
				<param pos="1" type="int"/>
				<param pos="2" type="int"/>
			</restfunction>
		</restcontroller>
		<restcontroller class="ExampleRestController" name="rest3">
			<restfunction name="addNumbers" alias="ad">
				<param pos="1" type="int"/>
				<param pos="2" type="int"/>
			</restfunction>
		</restcontroller>
		<restcontroller class="ExampleRestController">
			<restfunction name="addNumbers">
				<param pos="1" type="int"/>
				<param pos="2" type="int"/>
			</restfunction>
		</restcontroller>
	</restcontrollers>
</app>

}}}
